resources.string: There are alerts to download (which may be for some other part of the country), but we haven\'t been able to get from the RedadAlertas server after repeated tries. Make sure you\'re connected to the internet, and maybe check manually later. Also make sure your app is up to date.
Problem downloading latest alerts from network.
Can\'t connect to the network. Try again later?
Can\'t connect to RedadAlertas server. Try again later?
No response from RedadAlertas server. Try again later? (Is your internet connection working?)
Can\'t download data from RedadAlertas server. Make sure your app is up to date, and maybe try again later.
